overview: Pasti is not an island, is surfer's fantasy surrounded by waves on all sides. Pasti is not a dream, is a series of ideas and images that come to mind when sitting on the outside. Pasti is not a delusion, is unconscious disturbance of mental faculties caused by deep and unlikely barrels. Pasti is not a surfing video., is a survival manual for people tired of the routine of the big city. Pasti is Junior Faria flying on a carpet of coral, Grillo behind the green curtain, Pigmeu punching a wall, Master Gouveia drawing the purest line with his twin fin. Pasti is the newest travel by Hang Loose, made by the same director who brought us Sambatrancerocknroll and Quintal de Casa, Rafael Mellin.
title: Pasti
